Great Lulu dupe- almost the exact same

I was initially worried these shorts wouldn’t measure up to the Lulu brand, but I was so wrong! The material is identical to Lulu’s—soft, durable, and high-quality. The inner lining is a game-changer: not too tight like some Lulu liners can be, making them super comfortable. These shorts stay in place during workouts, fit perfectly, and don’t ride up. I’m beyond impressed and can’t wait to wear them for more workouts. The colors match the pictures provided. I have two colors! Purple and orange! Highly recommend!
Very comfortable highly recommend

Overall, I would buy again.
Cute, comfortable, and appears to made well so that they will last for several years. A very good buy. Daughter borrowed them and they look good on several body shapes.

They’re don’t ride up or fall down and fits perfectly. Have at least 3 of these so far. 10/10 recommend. They’re functional and affordable.

I’m 5’3” and 135 with athletic legs. I prefer a size medium in most workout shorts, and the medium fits to my preference. These shorts cover my butt and aren’t tight, which is what I wanted for running. The back pocket fits my iPhone 16 Pro and the front pocket is perfect for a key fob.

(It’s NOT that I’m buying a size too small either. If I buy a larger size, they would be too baggy.

These shorts are identical to lulu lemon shorts at a much less price.  They fit true to size. I am usually a small and the small fits me perfectly. They wick sweat. I ordered the Maroon and they are as pictured. I’m 5’7 , typically a size 12-14 and ordered the XL. They fit perfectly not tight or constricting. Fits perfectly around the waist and loosely in the legs LOVE THEM! Must buy. I’m grabbing them in all the colors. When they go back on sale.

These shorts are on the shorter side. I loved them because the back has a pocket big enough for your phone and some gels. There’s even a little front pocket! They are very light weight. I wore them for my marathon and they were cool and didn’t chaff me.

I’m on the fence about these. I usually wear under armor athletic shorts and while these are cute, they’re not at the top of my list.  I have fairly muscular legs and some shorts tend to be tight around my thighs, these aren’t. They give room for being flexible without worrying about ripping them BUT the waist band is odd. It doesn’t fall in a natural spot along my waist, too low to sit at my waist, but higher than low rise jeans. Just awkward. I have to pull them up, which makes them super short or push them down, which makes them fit weird.  I ordered an XL, and I’m generally a L to XL in all of my shorts with room because I don’t like them super tight. The waist on these is a little tight, just enough to be annoying, but not enough that the next size up would fit. They also don’t have a functional pocket.  I’ll keep these for the gym, but definitely wouldn’t buy another pair.
